analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#177-194) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#188-189)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#189-191)

ERC721Token (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#198-407) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#275-278)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#285-293)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaHero.withdrawDeposit (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1359-1370):
	External calls:
	- goldContract.transfer(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1365-1370)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addressToGoldDeposit (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1366-1369)
_ivForStats in CryptoSagaHero.mint (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1190) is a local variable never initialiazed

CryptoSagaCardSwapMerculet.payWithMerculet (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1445-1472) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-merculetContract.transfer(wallet1,_priceOfBundle / 2) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1461)
	-merculetContract.transfer(wallet2,_priceOfBundle / 2) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1461-1462)

CryptoSagaCardSwapMerculet.summonHero has external calls inside a loop:
	- heroContract.getClassRank(i) == _heroRankToMint && blackList[i] != true (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaCardSwapMerculet.payWithMerculet (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1445-1472):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(merculetContract.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _priceOfBundle) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1450-1451)
	- merculetContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_priceOfBundle) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1452-1472)
	- merculetContract.transfer(wallet1,_priceOfBundle / 2) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1461)
	- merculetContract.transfer(wallet2,_priceOfBundle / 2) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1461-1462)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- seed (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1468)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaCard.swap (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#776-791):
	External calls:
	- _rewardId = swapContract.swapCardForReward(this,_rank) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#783-787)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownedTokens (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#790-791)
	- ownedTokensIndex (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#790-791)
	- tokenApprovals (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#790-791)
	- tokenOwner (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#790-791)
	- totalTokens (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#790-791)

Reentrancy in CryptoSagaHero.transferDeposit (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1346-1358):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(goldContract.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1351-1352)
	- goldContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1355-1358)

	- addressToGoldDeposit (/unique_chucks/36/0xaa543201f04c3184cfbe716e44425cacac206afc.sol#1358)
